EmailTemplate.name: CHANGES - Ask contact owner to update - For leads (English)
EmailTemplate.subject: Privacy request - Contact details update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.OwnerFullName},
We have received a SFDC request from a customer contact {!Lead.Name} owned by you, to make changes/ updates to the information that DuPont has concerning them. According to our privacy policy, a customer/contact reserves the right to review, correct, update, suppress, delete or otherwise limit DuPontâ€™s use of their information.
Unless we receive an objection from you within the next 10 business days, we will proceed with the requested changes of the contact information related to this customer.
For any inquiries regarding our policy, please contact Mupwaya Mutakwa, our EMEA CMS Privacy Contact.
Regards,
DuPont Product Information Service EMEA
